member.name: IMFRealTimeClientEx.RegisterThreadsEx
member.summary: Notifies the object to register its worker threads with the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS).
member.param: The MMCSS task identifier. If the value is zero on input, the object should create a new MCCSS task group. See Remarks.
The name of the MMCSS task.
The base priority of the thread.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFRealTimeClientEx.SetWorkQueueEx
member.summary: Specifies the work queue that this object should use for asynchronous work items.
member.param: The base priority for work items.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFRealTimeClientEx.UnregisterThreads
member.summary: Notifies the object to unregister its worker threads from the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS).
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Notifies a pipeline object to register itself with the Multimedia Class Scheduler Service (MMCSS).
This interface is a replacement for the interface.
